name: Jodie Holmes
info:
• 简体中文名: 茱蒂·荷姆斯
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1990-05-10
detail: Jodie Holmes (born May 10, 1990) is the primary playable character, and the protagonist of Beyond: Two Souls. The narrative of Beyond: Two Souls follows Jodie through 15 (ages 8 - 23) years of her life. As the player experiences the game, they will receive more information about the afterlife, and discover the true meaning of the entity Aiden, the ghostly presence tethered to Jodie.
